original_title: The Magical world of Winnie the Pooh : Growing up with Pooh
overview: Four animated adventures for the Disney incarnation of Winnie the Pooh. In 'Cloud, Cloud, Go Away', Tigger learns that saying 'I'm sorry' is sometimes all it takes to make a new friend. In 'Me and My Shadow', Piglet discovers that he can be his own best friend. In 'Easy Come, Easy Gopher', Rabbit learns that honesty is the best policy when he secretly changes Gopher's blueprints. Finally, in 'The Bug Stops Here', teamwork is the name of the game when Pooh and his friends lend Christopher Robin a hand.
title: The Magical world of Winnie the Pooh : Growing up with Pooh
